item.title: The most effective productivity hacks for Microsoft Office
item.description:
Microsoft Office 2013 offers several improvements over previous versions, but long-time users may not be aware of these useful additions. At the Singapore launch of Office 365 Personal, Elsie Chong, Marketing Manager for Microsoft Singapore, highlighted her favorite new features: PDF Reflow in Word 2013 allows users to open PDF files as editable Word documents, retaining the original formatting as much as possible. The modified document can be saved as a PDF or a Word file...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-most-effective-productivity-hacks-for-microsoft-office/

item.title: The 'Save' feature is a new addition to Facebook
item.description:
Facebook has launched a new feature allowing users to save items they find on the platform for later viewing. According to a July 21st blog post, savable content includes links, locations, movies, TV shows, and music. This “Save” feature will be rolled out globally across iOS, Android, and web platforms in the coming days. Source: Facebook blog. Facebook Software Engineer Daniel Giambalvo, the author of the blog post, emphasizes that saved items remain private unless a user chooses to share them with friends...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-save-feature-is-a-new-addition-to-facebook/
